website_summaries.verdict: If narrow reading strips aren't working, this overlay gives a full-page view.
pros: Choice of single- or multi-color packs
Full-page overlay lets you see page better than narrow strips
Helps hone reading music as well as reading lines of text
cons: Full page may help focus and clarity but is less likely to help with tracking

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After hearing that colored overlays could help some of my piano students better read their music, I ordered a 12 pack of yellow transparencies. It was amazing to see the expressions on the faces of those who were helped by the overlays. Even one of my adult students said it aided her reading. The overlays come between two pieces of sturdy cardboard and very thin sheets of paper between each overlay. The package arrived when it was scheduled and in good shape. I will definitely order from this company again. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Wall

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality,
customer_reviews.text: The deepness of the color was poor nothing like Rosco, I had to layer 2-3 to get the filtering I needed, the sheets have blurs and minor flaws in the plastic. Reminds me of 1890 window glass. Packaged great. Caution low temp plastic fire hazard, turned black with a 60w bulb.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Many uses for yellow transparencies
customer_reviews.text: Yellow transparencies make reading easier for youngsters. Maybe oldsters as well! When photocopying, black ink looks darker—-good for old or faint print.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a good weight to use to read through.
customer_reviews.author: AV teacher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reading assistance
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for educational use. Helps students focus on the written page and enhances reading ability. Just put the yellow sheet right over the paper and it is easier for these students to read more accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Think Again

customer_reviews.title: Helped my students with reading their music
customer_reviews.text: I had read that using yellow overlays could help students who have difficulty reading, for instance those diagnosed with ADHD, dyslexia, or who are on the autism spectrum. I offered them to two of my piano students who had difficulty tracking the notes on the staff. Both said it helped them focus on the printed notes, and track them with their eyes while playing, easier than reading the black notes on bright white paper.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: They have helped my students with visual difficulties see types materials more clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets for beginning readers
customer_reviews.text: Got these sheets for helping children with reading problems to focus on the text.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Haller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Screen Filter
customer_reviews.text: Theses work great as computer monitor screen filters. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Helps with reading
customer_reviews.text: Helps kids with reading. My daughter uses these for school work and it helps her focus
customer_reviews.author: april banks

customer_reviews.title: Transparencies
customer_reviews.text: These work great for some reluctant readers. Cut to size and place over page the child is reading. Nicely boxed with paper between each sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for helping our students when learning to read.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Beavers

customer_reviews.title: see through yellow covers
customer_reviews.text: They help my piano student recognize notes/which better. I believe he has some dyslexia.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Quick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Arrived quickly. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: The overlays worked great in making ambiance lighting in my restaurant!
customer_reviews.author: Loisse H.

customer_reviews.title: helps my students who have special learning needs
customer_reviews.text: this simple yellow transparency when laid over the pages in my students (who have been diagnosed with disgraphia and dyslexia) sheet music books, lessens the glare from the white pages and allows them to focus more upon the print, the task of reading music notation! The difference between not using and using the yellow sheet is the success rate of my students!
customer_reviews.author: J. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Yellow transparent overlays help students read music
customer_reviews.text: My dyslexic piano student can now read music easily because she says "the lines don't wiggle anymore. " It has been amazing to see the difference in her note-reading and playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for school work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that we order a lot of.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Mosher

product_meta.title: 12 Pack - Colored Overlays, Transparency Color Film Plastic Sheets, Correction Gel Lighting Filter, Full Page 8½" x 11", Yellow
product_meta.description: Color:YellowA Colored Overlay is a colored, but transparent, plastic sheet or acetate that is placed on top of reading or copy text. Its purpose is to minimize the discomfort of glare from a white page and to mask the visual perceptual effects that can make reading unpleasant, or even impossible, for some individuals. This can improve clarity, eye movement control, ease of concentration and comfort.
feature_bullets: Helps kids with dyslexia reduce reading frustration
Overlays can improve clarity, eye movement control
Great for memory albums scrapbooks and various other arts and crafts projects
Clear, film designed for overlays, stencils, and protective coverings. Acid-free, it contains no plasticizes and offers flatness, clarity, and dimensional stability
